commands.description: This command will clean everything and run the whole build pipeline
commands.name: all
commands.shellCommand: rush clean && rush rebuild && rush test && rush lint
commands.summary: Clean & Run the entire build pipeline (clean, build, test, lint) for all projects

commands.description: This command will clean all the artifacts from all projects by calling 'clean' script in packages
commands.name: clean
commands.summary: Clean the artifacts for all projects

commands.description: Install & Run git-cz hook to create a commit by using handy generator
commands.name: commit

commands.description: This command will run lint checks in entire repository by calling 'lint' script in packages
commands.name: lint
commands.summary: Run lint checks for all projects

commands.description: This command will run tests in entire repository by calling 'test' script in packages
commands.name: test

commands.description: This command will upgrade all the dependencies in all the projects to the latest version
commands.name: upgrade
commands.shellCommand: find . -name package.json -maxdepth 4 | xargs -o -L 1 node common/scripts/install-run.js npm-check-updates@latest ncu --interactive --packageFile

commands.description: This command will generate a changelog after version bump
commands.name: changelog
